member.name: T:CovariantExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods that allow to treat collections, enumerables and lists as covariant of a generic type other than their constructed type (i.e. for down-casting collections).

member.name: M:CovariantExtensions.ToCovariant``2(System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{``0})
member.summary: Allows for covariance of generic ICollections. Adapts a collection of type into a collection of type
member.param: The collection where covariant will be applied

member.name: M:CovariantExtensions.ToCovariant``2(System.Collections.Generic.IList{``0})
member.summary: Allows for covariance of generic ILists. Adapts a collection of type into a collection of type
member.param: The list where covariant will be applied

member.name: M:CovariantExtensions.ToCovariant``2(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Allows for covariance of generic IEnumerables. Adapts a collection of type into a collection of type
member.param: The enumerable where covariant will be applied

member.name: T:CovariantExtensions.CollectionInterfaceAdapter`2
member.summary: Allows for covariance of generic ICollections. Adapts a collection of type into a collection of type

member.name: T:CovariantExtensions.EnumerableInterfaceAdapter`2
member.summary: Allows for covariance of generic IEnumerables. Adapts a collection of type into a collection of type

member.name: T:CovariantExtensions.ListInterfaceAdapter`2
member.summary: Allows for covariance of generic ILists. Adapts a collection of type into a collection of type
